Hernan Quintana

Projects

About

I'm an Informatic Engineer, who studied in Pontificia Universidad Catolica del Peru . I have more than 10 years of experience developing complex software solutions. I also hold an MBA from Universidad de Lima . Nowadays, I teach Software Engineering courses in Universidad de Lima .

Currently, I am working in Devos Inc (a company that I co-founded) as CEO, but also I am participating in other projects as Plustyle (a e-marketplace site for plus size clothes) and Creamas (a non-profit organization that helps with the education of young peruvian children).

Location

Currently
Lima, Peru

DEVOS INC

DEVOS INC is a software company who specializes in developing enterprise mobile software. We worked in many projects for peruvian an international companies like Automotores Gildemeister Peru, Yanbal International, Cineplanet, Oltursa, Nextel, etc. I was in charge of developing the technical (web and mobile) platform and software development methodology that helps to build the world class products that the company offers.

  • Web Page: DEVOS INC
  • Role: CEO and Co-Founder

CREA+

CREA+ is a social responsible company that promotes social responsability through young professional volunteerism, provisioning an educational offer that allows children to find and improve their skills. I participated in the creation and development of the enrollment system.

  • Web Page: CREA+
  • Role: IT group member

PLUSTYLE

PLUSTYLE is a e-marketplace sites that sells fashion clothes for plus size woman. It has the best brands from around the world and with a online stylist, can help you choose what suits you best. Currently in DEVELOPMENT.

  • Web Page: PLUSTYLE
  • Role: CTO
